name: Planet of the Slimes
description:
You are a rover sent to explore an unknown planet. When you arrived, you discovered that this planet is inhabited by strange slimy creatures who aren't very friendly. Try to survive as long as possible.

Use your speed, guns, or towers to outrun, outgun, or outwit your enemies.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Left Click: Fire (4 Energy)
  • Right Click: Place tower on rock pillar (200 Energy)

Everything uses one resource: energy.
Taking damage, firing your gun, and building turrets all cost energy. When you run out of energy, your journey is over.
